scope: Full UX consistency audit with emphasis on control-row alignment and border clipping

items.issue: Control row inputs/buttons show bottom-border clipping and vertical misalignment.
items.action: Reconcile control row height tokens with QSS padding/borders and enforce consistent sizing in factories.

items.issue: Control row variants show clipped bottom borders across inputs.
items.action: Verify control row sizing in _controls_grid and container height constraints; adjust as needed.

items.issue: Potential row-height mismatches between controls and buttons in mixed rows.
items.action: Normalize button/control heights and alignments across _controls_bar/_controls_grid/_action_row.

items.issue: Input/button padding may not match size tokens; QSS could override spacing inconsistently.
items.action: Audit QSS padding/min-height roles and align with UX style guide tokens.

items.issue: Control rows and filters may not share a consistent baseline alignment.
items.action: Confirm filter label + checkbox grid alignment and adjust spacing tokens if needed.

items.issue: Details action buttons may sit tight to panel borders in some sizes.
items.action: Verify _boxed_row in detail areas meets panel spacing rules.

items.issue: Check for any per-screen size overrides outside factories.
items.action: Audit for setFixedHeight/Width outside factories and move to tokens if required.
